0101110010101101 1001100101100100 0 -> sum: 1111011000010001, cout: 0
1000010111001110 1010100011100111 0 -> sum: 0010111010110101, cout: 1
0100111110100001 0011110000010100 1 -> sum: 1000101110110110, cout: 0
1100101000110000 1001000111011000 0 -> sum: 0101110000001000, cout: 1
1011001110010010 0011011100011111 0 -> sum: 1110101010110001, cout: 0
1111101100001011 0111101011101100 1 -> sum: 0111010111111000, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
